title: Not Feared in Sunlight (2U107)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. Each Nazgul is strength -4. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
Lore:	”'…our shapes cast shadows in their minds, which only the noon sun destroys….'”
Rarity:	U
